# iosxr_cef_pbts_forward_class (Data Source)

This data source can read the CEF PBTS Forward Class configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_cef_pbts_forward_class" "example" {
  forward_class = "1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `forward_class` (String) Forward Class number

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `fallback_to_any` (Boolean) Fallback to any class
- `fallback_to_class` (List of Number) Fallback to certain classes
- `fallback_to_drop` (Boolean) Fallback to drop
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
